full_text: Knitted hat and scarf in DROPS Air. The piece is worked in rib. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ See the ALMOND WHISPER HAT pattern here ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #almondwhisperset DROPS Design: Pattern ai-539 Yarn group C or A + A WHOLE SET : SIZES : S/M - M/L - L/XL YARN FOR WHOLE SET : DROPS AIR from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group C) 250-250-250 g colour 55, Light Beige SCARF: SIZE : Width: 20 cm. Length: 180 cm. YARN FOR SCARF : DROPS AIR from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group C) 150 g colour 55, Light Beige NEEDLES FOR SCARF : DROPS SINGLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 4.5 MM. KNITTING TENSION FOR SCARF : 18 stitches in width and 24 rows in height with stocking stitch on needle size 4.5 mm = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE: Needle size is only a guide. If you get too many stitches within 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. If you get too few stitches within 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
